PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-03932022-04-25,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Designating (1) the Commission that is Named Public Inquiry into the 2022 Public Order Emergency as a Department for the Purposes of that Act; and (2) the Prime Minister as the appropriate Minister with Respect to the Commission
PrecisOrder (1) designating the Commission named the PUBLIC INQUIRY INTO THE 2022 PUBLIC ORDER EMERGENCY as a department for the purposes of the Financial Administration Act; and (2) designating the Prime Minister as the appropriate Minister with respect to the Commission.
